thread.section_title: Prudent Financial Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Prudent Financial Services | prudentfinancial.net
thread.title: i.e. prayerworks
thread.title_full: Prudent Financial Services reviewed by i.e. prayerworks

author: i.e. prayerworks
title: i.e. prayerworks
text:
My experience with Deborah at Prudent Financial has always been nothing short of exceptional. She is professional, caring and always go above and beyond to meet my requests. In cases where it is not possible, she also explains the why's and why not with such grace and respect; better helping me the client to understand the process and practice behind what they do.
Irena at reception is always so kind and willing to check my account status no matter how many times I call or pop in to the office.
As for Jill and Gary, they do what needs to be done to assist even in extenuating circumstances and for that I sing their praises!
Ms. Thompson
